section.audio_text: Due to updated engine icing certification requirements, the engine static run-up and ground idle operations in icing conditions have also changed in the FCOM cold weather operations supplementary procedure for the LEAP-1B. When engine anti-ice is required and the Outside Air Temperature is 3° celsius or below (or if there is increased fan vibration due to fan ice accumulation), increase thrust on each engine to a minimum of 50% N1 then decrease thrust to idle. Repeat at intervals not to exceed 60 minutes.
